Module IO
Package service

Class ServiceLoader<T>

java.lang.Object
service.ServiceLoader<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the service interface or base class that loaded classes should implement/extend.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<T>
public class ServiceLoader<T> extends Object implements Iterable<T>
A generic service loader for dynamically loading and instantiating classes from a specified package that implement a given interface or extend a specified class.
Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static <T> ServiceLoader<T> load(String packageName, Class<T> type)
      Constructs a ServiceLoader for loading classes from a specific package that implement or extend the specified service type.
      Parameters:
      packageName - The name of the package to scan for classes.
      type - The interface or base class type that loaded classes should implement or extend.
